message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $13,000. I believe it offers incredible value, and I'm sure you'll be very satisfied with it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  Let's meet in the middle â€“ how about $11,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still looking to keep my expenses lower. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,000.
